snippet: New Jersey Governor Chris Christie said on Wednesday he would convene a bipartisan summit in September to seek ways to rescue  Atlantic City from a slump in its mainstay casino business....

headline.print_headline: New Jersey to Hold Summit to Rescue Atlantic City
headline.main: New Jersey to Hold Summit to Rescue Atlantic City

lead_paragraph: New Jersey Governor Chris Christie said on Wednesday he would convene a bipartisan summit in September to seek ways to rescue  Atlantic City from a slump in its mainstay casino business.
